content.question: Moving clockwise from left, the circle passes through the following points: (negative 1 comma 0) (0 comma 1) (1 comma 0) (0 comma negative 1) Two points labeled A and B are marked on the circumference of the circle: Point A is marked at (negative 0.8 comma 0.6) Point B is marked at (1 comma 0). An angle labeled alpha is drawn between the radius O B and radius O A. ​ ​The figure shows a unit circle in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane, an angle <math alttext="alpha"><semantics><mi>α</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in standard position, and three labeled points. Which of the following is the value of <math alttext="cos alpha"><semantics><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mi>α</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
